textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Tech is best for students who are serious about school, enjoy a challenge, and look forward to many job opportunities after graduation. Bang for the buck With as many scholarships as it gives out and its low rates, Montana Tech is usually pretty affordable for students and still offers the rigorous academics that should be the focus of a college like Tech. What to do for fun The residence life staff often have activities for the students, such as Thursday movie night, make-a-critter days, trips to old theaters in nearby towns, and other tours and such. Food and Dining The staff are generally polite and competent, but the cafeteria often lacks a healthy vegetarian option. It sometimes lacks any healthy option. As with all cafeteria food, sometimes unwelcome surprises (such as small pieces of cardboard) find their way into the food. Dorm Life Most freshmen are placed in a rather old building.
